title.rendered: Financial Commission Highlights Delkos Research as Part of New Value-Added Services

content.rendered:
September 6th, 2018, The Financial Commission, a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets, today announces highlights of the Delkos research offering that is now available to broker members as part of the recently launched “Value-Added” services.

What is Delkos Research?

 

 

Delkos research provides actionable and compelling research that can be distributed to customers through many digital channels.

While Delkos uses common principles of price and news analysis to identify trading opportunities or price movements it goes a step farther by distributing the research content in real-time to traders with great flexibility. This allows broker clients to easily act on new trading opportunities while protecting traders who already have open trades. Likewise, the Delkos suite allows for low frequency, high-value services for VIP or high-net-worth broker clients.

Benefits for Brokers

 

 

By using Delkos brokers can convert economic news events into actionable trading opportunities. This allows brokers to generate new leads, increase trader engagement and automatically alert customers of possible price moves using analytical research.  The Delkos offering is also a great way to retain traders by providing specialized tools that become a part of a trader’s daily routine.

Delkos research projects can be quickly integrated into brokers existing market research offering using a variety of connections, including API, iFrame, RSS Feed, and email clients.

Value-Added Services

The Financial Commission is pleased to offer Delkos research products complementary to Category A members of the Financial Commission for the first year of service*. To get more information on the service or to sign-up, please reach out to us at info@financialcommission.org.

*Delkos’ research package, including Lead Generation, Customer Retention, and VIP Trading is provided at no charge for the first year and is subject to the member being in good standing with the Commission per the Commission’s Rules and Guidelines. After the first year of service, Financial Commission members will be able to take advantage of special pricing offered by Delkos research to continue to use the service. The complimentary fee waiver will be canceled for brokers who cease membership with the Financial Commission.
